name: PaperGirl
description:
You are an origami girl with the power of teleportation, your goal is to find your way in a maze to find your tree. You will face this challenge with your little friend, an origami fox, who is always follow u.

You can only teleport for three times, because you magic is limited when you are distant from your tree, choose wisely when to use your power.

The maze are generated from a random seed and you have to complete the level to access the following; if you restart, you will face the same maze again until you complete it. 

Arrows - Movements
Space - Jump
X - Teleport
R - Restart

Find the tree in the maze

PS: It was my first attempt of using origami inside a videogame and also one of first PCG algorithm written by myself.
